Clifton.North Arlington High School:
North Arlington High School is a four-year comprehensive public high school that serves students in ninth through twelfth grade from North Arlington, in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States, operating as the lone secondary school of the North Arlington School District.
As of the 2015-16 school year, the school had an enrollment of 482 students and 46.0 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 10.5:1. There were 54 students (11.2% of enrollment) eligible for free lunch and 32 (6.6% of students) eligible for reduced-cost lunch.
